messages.text: Hey there, I'm Alexis from Pharma City, I'm restocking this week I need your advice
How can I help you? I sell paracetamols.
Hello! What types of paracetamol products do you currently have available for supply?
I have three types of paracetamols, 25 mg, 50 mg, 75 mg.
Thank you. Could you please specify the formulations for each of those dosages, for example, tablets, capsules, or liquid? Also, what are the minimum order quantities for each type?
I have three kinds of tablets capsules I don't sell liquids also the minimum order quantity for each type is five.

Understood. So, you offer 25 milligram, 50 milligram, and 75 milligram paracetamol in tablet and capsule forms, with a minimum order quantity of five for each. Can you provide details on your pricing tiers for these products, especially for bulk purchases?
25 milligrams is three dollars 50 milligrams is six dollars 75 milligrams is seven dollars so you will make I can help you make a lot of discount
Thank you for the pricing information. When you mention "a lot of discount," could you elaborate on your bulk pricing or discount options for larger orders?
I cannot provide this right now I need to go have a good day goodbye
Thank you for your time. Goodbye.
